title: Biogen Stock Could Have Run Up Too Far on Alzheimer’s Drug Revival
text:
Biogen triggered a rally in its shares Tuesday morning with news of the revival of its failed Alzheimer’s drug aducanumab, but the early-morning run-up may be overdone.

Shares of Biogen (ticker: BIIB) were up as high as 37% in early trading after the biotech company seemingly erased its signal failure of the year—one that has weighed not just on Biogen, but on the entire sector. The company said that despite canceling a Phase 3 trial in March when it appeared that the drug wasn’t working, it now plans to submit aducanumab...
description: Shares were up as high as 37% in early trading after the biotech company seemingly erased its signal failure of the year. Some analysts are more cautious.
